name: Breakin' In and Out
description: You are a burglar, who just woke up from being hit on the head. You managed to break into the building, only to be knocked out by a rival group of suited criminals. You find yourself in a different room than where you need to be, and decide to escape the guards confining you in the room. Next, you prepare yourself for navigating through the building, getting passed the suited criminals, getting what you came for, and getting out alive.
